name: getmaptilewithfrenchlabels
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool maptiles.
Tool description: Map Tiles for interactive online maps based on data by OpenStreetMap contributors with labels in English, French or Spanish. 
API description: Fetches a raster map tile with French labels from the RapidAPI Map Tiles service.

z.description: The zoom level of the map tile, ranging from 0 to 19.
